That's not what I meant. For one, you never posted Mustex using that technology. Plus, its moding to assume it worked if you used it without me replying. I'm the one that gets to post how the Iron Fist's shields reacted to it.

Keep in mind, Black Aracnia used the technology on relatively weak shields. The shields of the bases in NBW are much much stronger than that.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
>  I implied he used that same technology Black aracnia used when the 
> predicons stole the stasis pod,and if you don't watch the show then 
> why are you here?
